channel.title: Ipod sofware alternative?
channel.description:
I don't enjoy having all my music erased when I plug my Ipod into a different computer, or the fact Itunes encrypts all the music files , bad shit about over-protective Apple ect.
So what are some good alternatives to Itunes. Preferably one that can change the internal setting such as the owner and the original computer it was registered for.

item.title: Ipod sofware alternative?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Primadude:

Unlock/Jailbreak your iPod.

How many disadvantages come with this?

Read full topic

item.title: Ipod sofware alternative?
item.dc:creator: @mandood77 mandood77
item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:4, topic:308995”][quote author=mandood77 link=topic=405453.msg2997639#msg2997639 date=1255730869]

Unlock/Jailbreak your iPod.
[/quote]can u do that to a nano first gen?

With a nano first generation you can put your music straight onto it via it’s file storage, which can be accessed through ‘My Computer’.[/quote]but u know wats wierd, sometimes the songs comeout as three letter words lol

Read full topic

item.title: Ipod sofware alternative?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“mandood77, post:3, topic:308995”][quote author=Primadude link=topic=405453.msg2997634#msg2997634 date=1255730442]
Unlock/Jailbreak your iPod.
[/quote]can u do that to a nano first gen?[/quote]

With a nano first generation you can put your music straight onto it via it’s file storage, which can be accessed through ‘My Computer’.
